subject: Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 - Announcements: Use of Free and Open-Source AI Providers for Assignments and Projects
body_html:
Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 - Announcements: Use of Free and Open-Source AI Providers for Assignments and Projects
Posted Monday, November 24, 2025 2:19 PM EST

Dear Students,

Please note that you are not required to pay for any AI services (such as OpenAI GPT or Google Gemini) for any coursework, project, or assignment in this course.

You are encouraged to use free or open-source AI providers, many of which offer generous free tiers suitable for all course tasks and experiments.
Examples include:

  • Hugging Face Inference API – free access to open-source models

  • OpenRouter – unified access to Llama, Mistral, and other models

  • Google AI Studio (Gemini API) – includes a substantial free tier

  • Groq API – high-speed inference with a free developer tier

  • Local deployments – e.g., Ollama or other open-source models

All grading will continue to focus on your implementation quality, analysis, and framework design, not on which specific AI model or API you use.

Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 Go to Announcements >>
